# Jack The Butler - AI Agent Information

> Jack The Butler is a free, open-source AI-powered chatbot for hotels and hospitality businesses. It handles guest communication across WhatsApp, SMS, email, and web chat.

## Overview

Jack The Butler (Joint AI Control Kernel) is a self-hosted AI assistant designed for hotels, Airbnbs, hostels, and vacation rentals. It automates guest communication while keeping data private on your own server.

## Key Features

- Multi-channel support: WhatsApp, SMS, Email, Web Chat
- AI-powered responses using Claude, GPT, or local AI
- Knowledge base for property-specific information
- Task creation and staff escalation
- Automated workflows and scheduled messages
- Self-hosted with SQLite database
- 100% open source (MIT license)

## Documentation Structure

/docs/getting-started/introduction/ - What is Jack, who it's for
/docs/getting-started/quick-start/ - 5-minute deployment guide
/docs/getting-started/setup-wizard/ - Initial configuration walkthrough

/docs/installation/cloud/ - One-click cloud deployment (Railway, Render, Zeabur)
/docs/installation/docker/ - Self-hosted Docker setup
/docs/installation/source/ - Building from source

/docs/features/ai-responses/ - How AI responses work
/docs/features/knowledge-base/ - Training Jack on your property
/docs/features/channels/ - Communication channel setup
/docs/features/tasks/ - Task routing and escalation
/docs/features/automations/ - Automated workflows

/docs/configuration/ai-providers/ - Claude, OpenAI, Local AI setup
/docs/configuration/whatsapp/ - WhatsApp Business API
/docs/configuration/sms/ - Twilio SMS configuration
/docs/configuration/email/ - SMTP/IMAP email setup

/docs/api/authentication/ - JWT token authentication
/docs/api/rest/ - REST API endpoints
/docs/api/webhooks/ - Webhook integration

/docs/help/faq/ - Frequently asked questions
/docs/help/troubleshooting/ - Common issues and fixes

## Quick Links

- Website: https://jackthebutler.com
- Documentation: https://jackthebutler.com/docs/
- GitHub: https://github.com/JackTheButler/JackTheButler
- License: MIT

## Target Audience

- Hotel managers and owners
- Airbnb and vacation rental hosts
- Hostel operators
- Hospitality technology teams

## Technical Requirements

- Node.js 22+
- 1GB RAM minimum (2GB for local AI)
- SQLite database (included)
- Docker support available

## Contact

For questions about Jack The Butler, visit the GitHub repository or documentation.
